questions.question: write a program to find whether the given string is polindrome

what is the output of below and why?
console.log(typeof typeof 1)
questions.answere: The answer is "String", because typeof 1 returns "number" and typeof "number" is string

questions.question: Write a function called sum which will execute both console.log(sum(2,3)), console.log(sum(2)(3))
